title: Challenge Mode - Phase 6: AI Bot Integration
description: Align challenge mode with the new AI bot system. Update PHP code to use correct schema, create 20 unique challenge-specific bot personalities (separate from standard 'Play a Bot' personalities), and ensure challenge bots have proper player records.

requirements.detail: Update farkleChallenge.php to use correct column names (display_name, point_target, description)
Join with farkle_bot_personalities table to get difficulty level
Create 20 unique challenge-specific bot personalities (IDs 16-35, separate from standard bot IDs 1-15)
Update challenge bot lineup to reference new challenge-specific personalities
Ensure each challenge bot has a corresponding farkle_players record with is_bot=true

tasks.description: Update farkleChallenge.php to use correct schema and join with personalities
Create SQL migration script for 20 challenge bot personalities and player records
Verify challenge mode works with new bot system
